<h3 id="X12115">X(12115)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INNER-YFF TANGENTS TO ABC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^7-(b+c)*a^6-(b^2-8*b*c+c^2)*a^5+(b+c)*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a^4-(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^3+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :  <br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (12*sin(A/2)-2*sin(3*A/2))*cos((B-C)/2)+(2*cos(A)-4)*cos(B-C)+2*sin(A/2)*cos(3*(B-C)/2)+8*cos(A)-cos(2*A)-5  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12115) = 4*X(226)-3*X(5603) = 5*X(631)-4*X(993) = 7*X(3090)-8*X(3822) = 2*X(7680)-3*X(11237) = 2*X(10679)-3*X(11239)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(12115) lies on these lines: {1,4}, {2,104}, {3,3436}, {5,10584}, {8,912}, {10,6897}, {11,6968}, {12,6833}, {30,10679}, {36,6880}, {40,10915}, {55,2829}, {56,6834}, {57,1512}, {63,2096}, {84,9578}, {100,6948}, {355,377}, {376,535}, {382,12000}, {390,10728}, {443,5818}, {495,1012}, {496,10598}, {498,5450}, {517,5905}, {529,3428}, {631,993}, {952,3434}, {956,6907}, {958,6889}, {999,1532}, {1001,6976}, {1125,6898}, {1158,10039}, {1181,9370}, {1317,10947}, {1329,6967}, {1376,6955}, {1385,2478}, {1389,5555}, {1470,4293}, {1621,6930}, {1837,11047}, {2550,2801}, {2975,6825}, {3085,6906}, {3086,6941}, {3090,3822}, {3091,10586}, {3304,7681}, {3575,11400}, {3576,6947}, {3577,4654}, {3600,6848}, {3616,6893}, {3913,11826}, {4190,11499}, {4297,6899}, {4299,6796}, {5080,5731}, {5193,6969}, {5218,6950}, {5251,6878}, {5252,6001}, {5253,6944}, {5260,6989}, {5261,6847}, {5437,5587}, {5768,6826}, {5804,11037}, {5870,10930}, {5871,10929}, {5884,10573}, {5886,6957}, {6259,10935}, {6284,10965}, {6830,10590}, {6831,9654}, {6836,10526}, {6838,10530}, {6842,10527}, {6862,10585}, {6872,10267}, {6879,7951}, {6891,11681}, {6929,10246}, {6934,7354}, {6935,8164}, {6949,7288}, {6952,10588}, {6982,11680}, {7680,11237}, {7686,10404}, {7966,9580}, {7992,10970}, {9838,11955}, {9839,11956}, {9873,10878}, {10085,10827}, {10803,12110}, {11914,12113}</p>
<p>
X(12115) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4,1478), (956,6907), (1012,495), (3434,6923), (6938,55)<br>
X(12115) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,4,10531), (1,1519,5603), (1,6256,4), (3,10942,5552), (4,388,10532), (4,1056,5603), (4,7967,497), (4,10597,946), (4,10805,1), (4,10806,1479), (119,10269,2), (498,5450,6977), (1479,5882,10806), (3359,6735,5657), (3421,6916,5657), (5080,5731,6827), (6831,9654,10599), (7354,10955,11509), (7354,11500,6934), (10246,10742,6929)<br></p>
